characters.title: Lilimon
characters.description: This fairy Digimon will sweeten your mood and do whimsical things to you afterwards.

characters.title: Pironica
characters.description: Unlike Pirone, this funky babe is always cheery and ready to have some fun.

characters.title: Demy
characters.description: This loving girlfriend with the power of "mitosis". Demy can split herself into multiple, identical copies.

characters.title: Purple Heart
characters.description: This goddess is powered up and ready to do what Nintendoesn't.

characters.title: Erika
characters.description: This unkempt neighbor girl has a strange obsession with you in particular. Surely she's a normal girl...

characters.title: Iris
characters.description: Hiding from work and the outdoors, this homebody vampire loves anime, video games and junk food.

characters.title: Octavia
characters.description: Don't let this albino rat-girl's appearance fool you, her desires are anything but pure...

characters.title: Saint Eileen
characters.description: Sadistic healer and source of The Panacea. Eileen will give you succor while she teases your body.

characters.title: Shadow Leviathan
characters.description: This giant, aquatic creature from Planet 4546B is eager to be with you. Can you quench her leviathan-class lust?

characters.title: Stella
characters.description: This living doll will call you "Master". Her one wish: your happiness. If only you would tell her your desires...
